thread.title: Tauck Tour Hotel--wonderful
thread.title_full: Tauck Tour Hotel--wonderful - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tne1025
title: Tauck Tour Hotel--wonderful
text: We truly enjoyed our stay at the IC, Paris. Great location next to the Opera House as well as other nearby sites. Short walk to the river. Our room was nicely appointed with two small balconies, both with views of the Eiffel Tour. Would stay here again. The breakfast was also a highlight for us and was a splendid way to start each day.
